DOC.brief_summary: A pilot randomize control trial ( RCT ) generate effect size effect blood flow restrict exercise trunk extensor cross-sectional area ( primary outcome ) , strength endurance , whole body regional lean mass bone density , well rate recurrence LBP ( secondary outcome ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Back Exercises Neutralize Disability Study
DOC.detailed_description: This single-blinded , comparison-control group , single-center study effect exercise without blood flow restriction apply appendicular limb safety , body composition ( i.e. , muscle mass ) , muscle strength , muscle endurance , whole body regional lean mass bone density , back pain disability male female subject age 18-50 year recurrent low back pain poor moderate trunk extensor muscle endurance . Up 50 subject ( 2 arm ) randomize 1:1 ratio receive 10-weeks resistance exercise training ( group 1 ) without blood flow restriction ( group 2 ) . Randomization stratify sex . This study screen period 21 day ( day -21 day -1 , screen baseline measure ) , 10-week exercise treatment period ( day 1 day 70 ) 36-week follow period last exercise session ( day 70 day 322 ) . The total duration study first exercise session approximately 46 week . Baseline measure muscle size ( via MRI ) , muscle strength , muscle endurance , whole body regional lean mass bone density ( via DEXA ) , measure back pain disability obtain day -21 -1 . Primary Endpoint : The primary endpoint percent change trunk extensor muscle cross-sectional area measure MRI week 10 ( study day 70 ) start exercise training . Secondary : The secondary endpoint include : - Muscle strength - Muscle endurance ( time task failure ) - Whole body regional lean mass DEXA - Whole body regional bone density DEXA - Pain - Disability - Safety - Treatment acceptability Procedures Assessments Efficacy measure ( MRI , muscle strength , muscle endurance , lean mass , bone density , pain , disability ) obtain screen week 10 ( day 70 ) week 20 ( day 154 ) . Safety blood flow restrict exercise assess base adverse event finding monitoring . Subjects ask monitor report adverse event ( AEs ) experience time informed consent sign end-of-study visit . Treatment acceptability determine administer Treatment Evaluation Inventory survey end fourth sixteenth exercise session .

Men woman age 18 50 year , significant health issue condition , investigator 's opinion , would limit subject 's ability complete study per protocol would impact capability get accurate measurement study endpoint . 2 . Answer yes follow question : Have two episode low back pain past 12months least one episodes cause restriction work leisure time activity ? 3 . Exhibit low trunk extensor endurance define time task failure modifiedSorenson test le 176 second . 4 . Body mass index ( BMI ) 19 37 kg/m2 inclusive . 5 . With condition could limit participation supervise resistance training exercise base Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) ( i.e. , study participant answer yes question 14 exclude , answer yes 57 require clearance participation study physician ) . 6 . Sedentary lifestyle define classification `` low '' `` moderate '' level physical activity base score criterion International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) . 7 . Willing maintain current diet adhere exercise program describe study start new dieting/weight management program . 8 . Willing able return clinic visit complete studyrelated procedure . 9 . Able read , understand , complete studyrelated questionnaire 10 . Able read understand , willing sign inform consent form ( ICF ) . 1 . Participation progressive resistance exercise within previous 24 week prior screen . 2 . Participation clinical trial within 24 week prior screen . 3 . Hospitalization ( medical confinement ≥24 hour ) , immobilization , major surgical procedure require general anesthesia within 24 week prior screen , plan surgical procedure study period . 4 . Limb amputation ( except toe ) and/or fracture within 24 week . 5 . Osteoarthritis , rheumatologic disease orthopedic disorder allow completion motion require resistance exercise . 6 . Conditions ( myasthenia gravis , myositis , muscular dystrophy myopathy , include druginduced myopathy ) lead muscle loss , muscle weakness , muscle cramp myalgia . 7 . Chronic relapsing/remitting gastrointestinal disorder inflammatory bowel disease , irritable bowel syndrome gastrointestinal infection within 28 day screen . 8 . Acute viral bacterial upper low respiratory infection screen 9 . Moderate severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease . 10 . Back pain great 4 ( 10 point numeric pain rating scale ) screen 11 . Leg length discrepancy > 3 cm . 12 . Current recent ( i.e. , within 12 week ) narcotic muscle relaxant . 13 . Currently pregnant ( confirm via urine test ) planning become pregnant within next year screening . 14 . Report unexplained weight loss past 30 day ( > 10 pound ) . 15 . Report pending litigation relate low back pain currently receive disability low back pain . 16 . Report receive treatment low back pain health care practitioner past 6 week . 17 . History spine surgery hip arthroplasty . 18 . Cancer require treatment currently past 3 year ( except primary nonmelanoma skin cancer situ cervical cancer ) 19 . Moderate severe asthma current recur symptom within last 1year . 20 . Known history human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody and/or positive hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) and/or positive hepatitis C antibody ( HCV ) screening . 21 . Neurological condition result impaired muscle function mobility ( e.g. , stroke residual paresis , paralysis , multiple sclerosis , Parkinson Disease ) . 22 . Psychiatric condition warrant acute chronic therapeutic intervention ( e.g. , major depressive disorder , bipolar disorder , panic disorder , schizophrenia ) investigator opinion may interfere conduct study procedures 23 . History cardiac condition heart failure ( NYHA class IIIV ) , angina ( include unstable angina ) , myocardial infarction , cardiomyopathy , cardiac arrhythmia ( except stable sinus dysrhythmia atrial fibrillation ) valvular heart disease ( except asymptomatic mitral valve prolapse ) . 24 . History peripheral vascular disease . 25 . Subjects follow abnormal ECG finding screen exclude : Electrocardiogram finding indicative leave ventricular hypertrophy ( LVH ) ( base Cornell voltage criterion ) : For men : S V3 plus R VL > 2.8 mV ( 28 mm ) For woman : S V3 plus R VL > 2.0 mV ( 20 mm ) Electrocardiogram find QT prolongation define QTcF > 470 m 26 . Diabetics use insulin exclude . 27 . Abnormal uncontrolled blood pressure screen visit define diastolic BP > 100 and/or systolic BP > 160 mm Hg ; take antihypertensive medication , stable dos medication 3 month . 28 . Current recent history ( within 1 year screen ) heavy alcohol consumption ( male ≥ 21 drinks/week , 4 drinks/day ; female ≥ 14 drinks/week , 3 drinks/day ) drug abuse . 29 . Current previous use drug know influence muscle mass performance within 24 week . These may include , limited , anabolic steroid , IGF1 , growth hormone ( GH ) , replacement androgen therapy , antiandrogen therapy . 30 . Use systemic glucocorticoid within 12 week prior screen . 31 . Having body dimension exceed MRI exercise equipment limit . 32 . Unable undergo MRI ( e. g. body contain metallic medical device equipment , include heart pacemaker , metal prosthesis , implant surgical clip , prior injury shrapnel grind metal , exposure metallic dust , metallic shaving tattoo contain metallic dye ) . 33 .
